translation.en: [narrator] In a distant world’s time of need,
an ancient prophecy summoned the Toa.
Six legendary heroes,
each powered by the energy of the island’s elements.
translation.ko: 각각 섬의 원소의 힘을 지니고 있었다

translation.en: Tahu, Toa of Fire.
Kopaka, Toa of Ice.
Pohatu, Toa of Stone.
Gali, Toa of Water.
Onua, Toa of Earth.
Lewa, Toa of the Jungle.
Much has happened, I know.
After so many thousands of years,
your families have returned
to rebuild the Mask Makers’ City.
If must seem strange.
You have only known the region of the Jungle.
And you, the regions of Stone and Ice and Water.
translation.ko: 자네가 아는 곳은 돌 얼음, 물의 구역뿐이니

translation.en: But we are Okotans,
and once, this was the centre of our world.
And now we have returned.
I’m sure you have questions, but wait.
translation.ko: 물론 궁금한 게 많겠지 하지만 기다리게

translation.en: First, let me tell you how we came to return to our city
translation.ko: 먼저 우리가 어떻게 돌아오게 됐는지 말해주지

translation.en: and give you a taste of what may lay ahead.
Sit.
Once, this was a beautiful city.
And I like to think it will be again.
But that will depend on more than your parents.
It will depend on six heroes, from another time and place!
And it will depend on if they can harness the elements that give our planet life.
translation.ko: 우리 행성을 되살려 낼 그들의 엘리멘트에 달렸지

translation.en: You know them from the regions where you live.
translation.ko: 자네들이 살던 곳이니 아마 알 거야

translation.en: Fire, Water, Jungle, Earth, Stone and Ice.
translation.ko: 불, 물, 정글, 흙 돌 그리고 얼음

translation.en: For you, they are just corners of our island,
but to the Toa, they are lifeblood.
But before there was trouble, there was peace.
translation.ko: 그 일이 일어나기 전 이곳은 평화로웠어

translation.en: And maybe that’s where we should begin.
More than a thousand years ago,
this was a peaceful and vibrant place.
Our Island’s two protectors, Ekimu and his brother, Makuta,
translation.ko: 섬의 두 수호자 에키무와 그의 동생 마쿠타는

translation.en: harnessed the power of the elements and forged them into masks.
But Makuta grew jealous of his brother and hungry for the power.
translation.ko: 마쿠타는 형을 질투했고 힘을 가지고 싶었어

translation.en: So unbeknownst to his brother, Ekimu,
the jealous Makuta broke a sacred law
translation.ko: 질투에 눈이 먼 마쿠타는 신성한 법을 어기고

translation.en: and created a mask that combined the power of all the elements.
translation.ko: 모든 엘리먼트의 힘을 결합한 마스크를 만들었어

translation.en: He called it the Mask of Ultimate Power.
But, as the power of the mask surged through Makuta,
he became dark and evil.
Knowing he had to act quickly, Ekimu took the sacred hammer
translation.ko: 이 사실을 눈치챈 에키무는 신성한 망치로

translation.en: and knocked the mask from the face of his brother.
Ekimu saved Okoto, but the cost was great.
Both Ekimu and Makuta were plunged into endless sleep.
translation.ko: 에키무와 마쿠타는 영원한 잠에 빠져들게 됐어

translation.en: Our ancestors laid Ekimu to rest.
The masks, too powerful to be trusted to mortals,
translation.ko: 그리고 힘없는 우리에겐 벅찬 존재였던 마스크는

translation.en: were hidden away forever.
And after Ekimu was sealed into a secret tomb,
the Mask Makers’ City was abandoned.
Although Makuta lay buried deep beneath our island,
translation.ko: 그러나 비록 마쿠타가 섬 깊은 곳에 묻혔지만

translation.en: his spirit remained powerful.
He summoned dark forces to find his Mask and awaken him.
translation.ko: 암흑 세력을 시켜 마스크를 되찾아 깨어나려 했지

translation.en: If Makuta’s minions managed to awaken him,
our island would be plunged into darkness.
translation.ko: 우리 섬은 어둠의 늪에 빠지게 될 거였네

translation.en: So we, the protectors,
gathered and performed an ancient rite.
Their legend was carved into the walls of our temples,
translation.ko: 영웅의 전설은 사원 벽에 새겨져 있었고

translation.en: and their names were kept alive in our rituals.
translation.ko: 그들의 이름은 우리의 의식 속에 살아있었지

translation.en: These were the Toa.
And it would be up to them to save Okoto.
The Toa of the Jungle, Lewa,
translation.ko: 정글의 토아 레와는 빠른 발 놀림과 재치로 유명하지

translation.en: was fast on his feet and quick witted,
translation.ko: 레와는 빠른 발 놀림과 재치로 유명하지

translation.en: like the Jungle that gave him his power.
He was constantly changing, and the most playful of the group.
translation.ko: 쉴 새 없이 움직이는 무리 중 최고의 익살꾼이야

translation.en: The brooding Pohatu was the most serious of the group.
translation.ko: 점잖은 성격의 포하투는 무리 중 가장 진지하다네

translation.en: And while the Toa of Stone was rarely happy,
translation.ko: 그러나 이 돌의 토아가 한번 화났다 하면

translation.en: he was fearless and powerful.
Kopaka, the Toa of Ice, was fearless and strong,
but he could be as inflexible and cold
as the element that gave him power.
Gali was as powerful as the others,
but as resilient as the Water that was her element.
The silent, powerful Onua, the Toa of Earth,
would provide a foundation.
translation.ko: 조용하지만 강한 흙의 토아, 오누아 그는 흙이 주는 속성처럼 기반을 마련하는 데 능해

translation.en: Like the Earth that gave him power,
translation.ko: 그는 흙이 주는 속성처럼 기반을 마련하는 데 능해

translation.en: he was immovable and enduring.
There was Tahu, the Toa of Fire,
who saw himself as a leader
even before he knew there were others like him.
translation.ko: 다른 토아가 있다는 걸 알기 이전부터

translation.en: With the help of their Protectors,
the Toa found the Masks of Power.
As they put on the Masks of Power, an ancient prophecy was fulfilled.
translation.ko: 그들이 마스크를 쓴 순간 고대의 예언이 실현됐지

translation.en: And for the first time,
the Toa experienced the elemental power that each of them was born to wield.
translation.ko: 토아는 각 엘리멘트가 지닌 위력을 경험하게 되었어

translation.en: The Toa had power, but they needed the wisdom of Ekimu.
translation.ko: 토아는 힘을 가졌지만 에키무의 지혜가 필요했지

translation.en: Only he could guide them to their true destiny.
translation.ko: 그만이 진정한 운명으로 이끌어줄 수 있었으니까

translation.en: The Toa’s search for Ekimu brought them here,
to the Mask Makers’ City.
But when they arrived, it didn’t look like it does now.
translation.ko: 그러나 그들이 도착했을 때 이곳은 지금과는 달랐어

translation.en: Then, it was a dark place, overrun with evil creatures.
And around every corner lay a trap!
And for the first time in a thousand years,
the footsteps of the living echoed through the Mask Makers’ City
translation.ko: 수 세기간 버려졌던 마스크 장인의 도시에

translation.en: that we abandoned so many centuries before.
One by one,
the Toa vanquished the creatures Makuta had sent to stop them,
finally defeating the fearsome Skull Scorpions
translation.ko: 그리곤 마침내 무시무시한 스컬 스콜피온까지 무찔러

translation.en: and reaching Ekimu’s tomb.
The Toa realised that their history and our planet's were entwined.
translation.ko: 자신들의 역사와 이 행성이 서로 얽혀있는 걸 깨달았지

translation.en: As they looked upon the sleeping Mask Maker,
somehow, they knew how to awaken him.
The six heroes had travelled far into the ancient city,
translation.ko: 여섯 영웅은 먼 여행 끝에 고대 도시로 와

translation.en: defeating many enemies.
But only by retrieving the Mask of Creation
would Ekimu stand a chance against his brother.
Makuta’s most powerful minions fought
to keep the Toa from the Mask Makers’ forge.
translation.ko: 마스크 장인의 대장간을 지키기 위해 싸웠지

translation.en: But the Toa were ready. Or so they thought.
They caught the Skull Grinder before he could destroy Ekimu’s mask.
translation.ko: 에키무의 마스크를 없애려는 스컬 그라인더를 찾았지만

translation.en: But the creature was as cunning as he was powerful,
and, knowing the Toa would stop him from destroying the mask,
translation.ko: 그가 마스크를 노리는 토아의 계획을 눈치채곤

translation.en: he put it on and felt its power surge through him.
translation.ko: 마스크를 얼굴에 쓰자 그 힘이 온몸에 차올랐어

translation.en: Filled with the Mask Maker’s power,
the Skull Grinder knocked the masks from the faces of the Toa.
Without their masks, the heroes had lost their power.
But they knew they must fight on, even if victory seemed impossible.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 불가능한 싸움을 멈출 수는 없었어

translation.en: The heroes fought bravely until they had nothing more to give.
But their valiant effort gave Ekimu the time he needed.
Now wielding his ancient hammer, Ekimu took back the Mask of Creation
translation.ko: 그는 신성한 망치를 휘둘러 창조의 마스크를 빼앗았어

translation.en: and regained the power he once had.
The six Toa had done their duty,
awakened Ekimu and retrieved the Mask of Creation.
translation.ko: 창조의 마스크를 되찾아오는 임무를 완수하게 되었어

translation.en: But evil was not defeated.
Their true fate was still waiting, deep inside the darkness.
translation.ko: 그들의 운명은 어둠 속 깊은 곳에서 때를 기다렸어

translation.en: Prophecy had brought the Toa to Okoto.
But what they’d experienced made them more than just heroes.
translation.ko: 이곳에서의 경험으로 그들은 영웅 이상의 존재가 됐지

translation.en: They have become legends.
But the challenges that lie ahead are huge,
translation.ko: 하지만 그들 앞에 놓인 길은 매우 험하다네

translation.en: and the future of our entire world is at stake.
translation.ko: 전 세계의 운명은 바람 앞에 놓인 등불이지

translation.en: Their journey beings anew.
With their new armour and weapons, forged by the Mask Maker himself,
translation.ko: 마스크 장인이 손수 만든 새 갑옷과 무기를 지니고 임무를 계속해 나갈 걸세

translation.en: the quest continues.
translation.ko: 새 갑옷과 무기를 지니고 임무를 계속해 나갈 걸세

translation.en: as the Toa begin the Search for One.
